overview: With the metaphor of the Stoneymollan Trail, a hiking trail out of Glasgow, the film explores Charlotte Prodgerâ€™s personal archive, with material from multiple formats that includes an archive of miniDV tapes that Prodger shot between 1999 and 2004, recent footage shot on her iPhone and HD camera, and screenprinted graphic forms. The resulting single-screen video piece is a meditation on memory, subjectivity and desire.
title: Stoneymollan Trail
